text:
@PMOIndia @narendramodi Sir with due respect I am also of the opinion to continue the complete lockdown up to 30 April all over the country with more strictness in hotspot areas.From May onwards depending upon the course of COVID19 in April,relaxations may be given to unaffected areas .
Thanx_allthebest
